definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: Needle Stimulation Anaesthesia has a series of advantages in medical operations.
sentences.chinese: 針麻有一系列的優點，因此受到世界各國的普遍重視。

sentences.english: The present investigation elaborates the quantitative method for experimental acupuncture anaesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 本文對建立實驗針麻研究的定量方法進行了探討。
